Attributes.description: How feminist scholarship has shaped and reinterpreted accounts of the subject, drawing on such traditions as structuralism, poststructuralism, psychoanalysis, postcolonialism, postmodernism, and Queer Theory.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of GRSJ 101, GRSJ 102 or (b) all of WMST 101, WMST 102. (or third-year standing.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 15:30, End Time: 17:00, Building: To, Room: Be
